website_summaries.verdict: Affordable with the option to add attachments such as an edger, blower, or pole pruner. It might not be stout enough for heavier jobs, though.
pros: A good trimmer that can be expanded with a great assortment of attachments

customer_reviews.title: right out of the box it bogged down. I ...
customer_reviews.text: right out of the box it bogged down. I wish now I would not have purchased it. once I put gas in it I was out of luck for returning it.
customer_reviews.author: rah123

customer_reviews.title: Great for light duty
customer_reviews.text: You need to be aware of what you're getting, which is a light duty machine for occasional use. If that's what you need this is perfect. Started right up and motor runs well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kozaczynski

customer_reviews.title: I like it and it was a good price
customer_reviews.text: It was a little hard to start right out of the box, but that is to be expected. The 25cc engine is a little small for heavy brush or weeds, but does grass very well. I cleared my garden with it and it made it through the tough stuff but the engine labored a bit. It has to have time to rev up to tackle heavy stuff. It could use a small carburetor adjustment which is no big deal. I like it and it was a good price. I like the fact that it is a Poulan which is made by Husqvarna.
customer_reviews.author: William W. Heiberger

customer_reviews.title: This is a very light easy to start Weed wacker, NOT Durable
customer_reviews.text: On the second use, the week wacker kept dying requiring several restarts. On the 4th or 5th restart the pull cord pulled out and wouldn't retract. Now I have a useless machine. I cannot find any parts available to fix this unit, and i cannot find a local repair facility to fix it either. UPDATE: I took it apart today to try and rewind the pull string or repair it in some way, and it is useless. It is not serviceable. I might light it on fire.
customer_reviews.author: TIM H.

customer_reviews.title: No longevity.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trimmer hoping for good quality. The first season it worked great. The second season it seemed to need to warm up a little more to work. Now in the third season it had a very hard time starting and wouldn't stay running. I've cleaned the fuel filter, and spark plug and still nothing. Checked the stop switch, nothing. I have always stored it per the instructions and used the proper fuel mixture. As far as I'm concerned, to only get two seasons of home use out of a trimmer is ridiculous. Never buy a poulan weed eater.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is a good quality metal
customer_reviews.text: Came in on time. Product is a good quality metal. It has adjustable handle and it comes with a 50:1 oil mix for you to mix with a gallon of gas. It also comes with string already in the head. You do have to assemble it but it is not difficult and it requires no tools to assemble. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Fryar

customer_reviews.title: Colossal piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: Fought and fought it...finally got it adjusted right. It ran for about two hours then refused to start. Last poulan product I buy.
customer_reviews.author: nerrond

customer_reviews.title: Not a good trimmer.
customer_reviews.text: I had more issues with this trimmer than any other trimmer I have ever owned. Gas cap was hard to put on and would drip gas everywhere. Hard to start. Hard to keep running. Hard to load the spool. Finally gave up when it kept stalling so it went to the curb for the scrappers to get. This was from day 1 of owning this product. This was my first and only product I will ever buy from Poulan. I have owned numerous trimmers over the years and by far one of the worst ones on the market.
customer_reviews.author: P.G.P

customer_reviews.title: Good trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I've read some of the other reviews and am surprised at the low rating of this weed eater. I've only had mine for about two months but what I have used it has surpassed my expectations. Its easy to start and seems very powerful, I've only got at most 5 hours of use with it so far as I don't necessarily need to weed eat every time I mow. I think this is a very decent trimmer for the price and am very happy that I purchased this, I will keep this updated if i run into any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Bakeman

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool......And Get The Edger Attachment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to replace my Poulan Pro that I had for 9 years. The old one finally broke inside the upper shaft and was slightly more to buy new than to fix. The new one started much easier than the old...they must have improved the starter system. If you don't have the edger attachment, get it. My lawn looks much better than when I used to edge with the string. With the two attachments, it's the best tool I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered yesterday and I used it for nearly 2 hours doing a little bit of everything (I've been without a trimmer for too long). Edging - Great, trimming around trees - Great, chewing up waist high weeds and grass - Great. I was even surprised to find out it would take out small trees about as thick as a pencil. Overall I'm very happy with the purchase. I ran through 2 tanks of gas last night so we'll see how well it holds up throughout the season. It was heavier than I thought it would be but I suppose that's a nice trade off considering it's more powerful than I thought it would be too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and performs well. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of heavy and a tad bit short making it hurt my back, I am 5'7". It kind of pulls in to the thicker weeds and grass if you can relate. But overall a great performer and value. Very easy start, just be sure to mix as recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to write home about
customer_reviews.text: The trimmer has been hard to start. Not easy as advertised. I'm on my 3rd tank of gas and a grommet (the metal piece the trimmer line comes through) has already come off the trimmer head. Other than that it seems to be OK. I am buying a brush cutter head and will review that after I use it a while.
customer_reviews.author: EEWoos

customer_reviews.title: Weed eater is alright
customer_reviews.text: This product bogs down sometimes and works alright. Had many issues with poulan pro trying to get anything worked on sending me to company's who either doesn't work on them anymore or just doesn't want to work on their stuff
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, easy to start (usually first or second pull) and plenty of power, so it fit my needs perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: terry Richey

customer_reviews.title: Housing that holds trimmer line broke
customer_reviews.text: Liked the trimmer, but the trimmer head made from a light weight material. Housing that holds the trimmer line broke on pieces. Didn’t do any commercial work with it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great value in this trimmer...
customer_reviews.text: Easy start and easy to use. Enjoy using the trimmer. My wife enjoys the trimmer and not heavy for her.
customer_reviews.author: PDXRu

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Wicked nice weed eater, works great, weeded ed and edged the yard first day, after second pull wouldn't stop. Great weed eater.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Nice weed eater runs great and light
customer_reviews.text: Nice weed eater runs great and light. The only thing that I didn't like was the string head it only holds tiny strind.
customer_reviews.author: shawn holder

customer_reviews.title: I have had good luck with Poulan products in the past
customer_reviews.text: I have had good luck with Poulan products in the past. However my luck has run out. This trimmer runs well for about 15 minutes then quits for 30 minutes. From what I can figure the engine overheats and needs to cool down. 15 minutes on, 30 minutes off makes for a long day of trimming. I would pass on this trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: David C Holzrichter

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I also got the brush cutter but have ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I also got the brush cutter but have not used it yet. I live in the North Idaho outback and need secure tools to keep the brush down for fire control. This fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Buck

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Unit seems heavier than older model. Hard to start at times. Replacing trimmer line seems like an all day affair very difficult to remove to restring and spool not user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I had to set the carburetor if you don't know how to do this you will need to take it to a dealer
customer_reviews.author: mark frankenfield

customer_reviews.title: Bogs down.
customer_reviews.text: Bogs down a lot, even if you change the angle of it, it will bog down. You have to keep the idle high on this just to finish the job. Very annoying
customer_reviews.author: Rob King

customer_reviews.title: It has great cutting power
customer_reviews.text: This machine rocks! It has great cutting power. Be sure and wear eye and body protection. Started on a dime and runs great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t run as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t run. Sent it back. Just could have been a bad run.
customer_reviews.author: 2candan49

customer_reviews.title: you need to let it cool
customer_reviews.text: after using for a while, you need to let it cool down
customer_reviews.author: Choco.Latte

customer_reviews.title: it bogs down a little when turned to the side at times but otherwise a good trimmer.
customer_reviews.text: Starts right up after 4 or 5 pulls, it bogs down a little when turned to the side at times but otherwise a good trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: John Rooker

customer_reviews.title: My boys did not like using it because it vibrates too much and is ...
customer_reviews.text: The trimmer died in one year. My boys did not like using it because it vibrates too much and is not fun to handle.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for first year and a half. Tried to start it this week with no luck. No spark to spark plug. Ignition coil seem to have died. My last sears string trimmer lasted 20 years. Don't buy does not last.
customer_reviews.author: f. miller

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to use, the price is right and it has more than enough power for working on my acre.
customer_reviews.author: David Mahan

customer_reviews.title: This is really a workhorse. It isn't hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really a workhorse. It isn't hard to start and live the fact we can change up with other attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Warren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it works good but it is hard to start at times
customer_reviews.author: garyb

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Starts easy, feeds the string with just a soft tap on the ground, and works on heavier grass and cat tails.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Fisher

customer_reviews.title: simple and versatile
customer_reviews.text: It works really well. Love the simplicity and versatility of it. Have already used it quite a bit
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Right out of the box it didn’t want to run. It eventually did and I’ve only used it once so who knows. Not off to a good start.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan M.

customer_reviews.title: Not running
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t stay running from when I purchased it. Had to send it back the next day.
customer_reviews.author: John Oyler

customer_reviews.title: Don't Hesitate
customer_reviews.text: Powerful weed eater. Sexy design. Easy to handle and start. Would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S.

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Edges and trims we'll. Would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: zeetampa

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to start. Continuously bogs down then will not restart. Worst gas trimmer i've ever owned. Total junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only Good For A Few Months
customer_reviews.text: My 9 time using it since I brought it in March 2018, today it will not start.
customer_reviews.author: Valued Customer

customer_reviews.title: runs better, but still a little
customer_reviews.text: Bogged down to the point of stalling, removed the spark plug and re- gapped it, runs better, but still a little boggy
customer_reviews.author: Ken S.

customer_reviews.title: Need a few more hands but is a good solid trimmer.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good machine- hate the process to replace the trimmer line as it takes like 3 hands to get the spool- line and threading handled. Once it is ready the machine operates well.
customer_reviews.author: Darin206

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: I received the product and put it together. Put gas in and it started right up. But the head will not spin.
customer_reviews.author: Cody goninen

customer_reviews.title: One of the better gas trimmers that I've used
customer_reviews.text: I've used it a few times now and so far no problems. It starts up within 1-2 pulls. One of the better gas trimmers that I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but on a pretty big yard
customer_reviews.text: Only used once so far, but on a pretty big yard, almost an acre. A couple times it started pretty easily, a couple times it didn't. Love the continual spool - just tap and go - so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Worst weed eater I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to start. Takes multiple pills to start. Worst weed eater I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not a good START!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box and would not start. Now I have to spend more money to get it fix.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Milantoni

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Peace of garbage. The power head broke after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with my choice and price.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the light weight and ease of start. Couldn't wait until it was delivered. Was doing all my trimmings with a push mower this lawn season. But got old quick and trimming with the Poulan Weedeater is so much better. As long as I don't cut down any of my girlfriend's flowers. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Wildman76

product_meta.title: Poulan Pro PR25SD, 16 in. 25cc Gas Straight Shaft String Trimmer
product_meta.description: The Poulan Pro PR25LD is a straight shaft trimmer well-suited for more demanding residential lawn maintenance and is powered by a reliable SureFire 25cc 2-cycle gas engine. With a spring assisted start system and 17" maximum cutting width, this model is easy to use, efficient, and cost effective. Split boom shaft with Pro-Link attachment system transforms your trimmer into a multi-functional yard machine. Additional attachments including a blower, brushcutter, cultivator, pole pruner, and edger are sold separately.
feature_bullets: SureFire Fuel Delivery System. Easy as..Prime, Choke and Pull
Effortless Pull Starting - Spring assisted starter system for ease of starting
Equipped with a dual-line feed Tap'N Go head for a superior cutting result. Reloading the trimmer spool is quick and simple
Attachment Capable with up to five additional Pro Link attachments

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars107 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
